# makeCommandBuffer()

**Instance Method**

Creates a new command buffer.

## Declaration

```swift
func makeCommandBuffer() -> (any MTL4CommandBuffer)?
```

## Return Value

A [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTL4CommandBuffer] instance, or `nil` if the function failed.
title: makeCommandBuffer()
